segments.text: I've got a reservation here . My name is John Sandals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Sandals , may I see your ID , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One second , please , while I dig it out . Here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , sir , do you have a credit card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . Do you accept American Express ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , Mr . Sandals , but we accept only MasterCard or VISA .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's okay , I've got plenty of cards . Here's my VISA .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . You're in room 507 . It's a single queen-size bed , spacious , and nonsmoking . Is that suitable ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's just what I wanted .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here's your key , sir . If you need anything , just dial 0 on your room phone .
segments.speaker: S2
